availability and commitment will be key to determining The X Factor's judges, as unlike American Idol, the new show will require its judges to mentor and work with the contestants on a near-daily basis. Charlotte. The 49ers neutralized Tu Holloway , a player of the year candidate, and handed the Musketeers their first A-10 loss, 66-62. Tu Holloway missed all eight of his three-point tries and went 3 of 17 overall. It's like in football if you're playing Michael Vick , 49ers coach Alan Major told the Charlotte Observer.`` You'd rather Michael Vick throw it than run. We'd rather have[ Tu Holloway ] shooting over you rather than driving around you.'' 9. Poor man

With more than 83,000 followers, Jason Pollock is one of the 140 most influential people on Twitter, according to a report in The New York Times. Social media is a powerful tool when used for philanthropy and to highlight innovative products like the new Ford Focus, Jason Pollock said.`` I'm thrilled to be participating in this historic social media event and to be raising money for my father's FREE Partnerships.''
